script: waitForId(); waitForId('pluginsection'); document.body.style.backgroundColor = 'black'; document.getElementById('noteinput').style.backgroundColor = 'black'; document.getElementById('noteinput').style.color = 'lightgreen'; document.getElementsByClassName('header')[0].style.color = 'green'; document.getElementsByClassName('header')[0].innerText =   'QuickNotes: Dark Mode'; document.getElementById('noteName').style.backgroundColor = 'black'; document.getElementById('noteName').style.color = 'lightgreen'; document.getElementById('pluginsection').style.backgroundColor = 'black'; document.getElementById('pluginsection').style.color = 'lightgreen'; document.getElementsByClassName('nlist')[0].style.backgroundColor = 'black'; document.getElementsByClassName('nlist')[0].style.color = 'lightgreen';  function but() {   document.querySelectorAll('button').forEach((element) => {     element.style.backgroundColor = 'black';     element.style.color = 'white';   }); } setInterval(but(), 100);
name: Darken
